```{r}
rm(list = ls())
set.seed(2233)

prior <- rep(0.25, 4)

A_no <- round(runif(4, 0, 1), 2)
B_no <- round(runif(4, 0, 1), 2)

A_yes <- round(1 - A_no, 2)
B_yes <- round(1 - B_no, 2)

tab <- data.frame(
  Location = paste0("Location ", 1:4),
  Prior = prior,
  A_No_Distraction = A_no,
  A_Yes_Distraction = A_yes,
  B_No_NoSeat = B_no,
  B_Yes_NoSeat = B_yes
)

tab
```

## (ii) Bayes: Distraction = Yes

```{r}
num_D <- tab$A_Yes_Distraction * tab$Prior
post_D <- num_D / sum(num_D)
tab$P_L_given_DistractionYes <- round(post_D, 4)
tab
```

## (iii) Bayes: No Seat = Yes

```{r}
num_S <- tab$B_Yes_NoSeat * tab$Prior
post_S <- num_S / sum(num_S)
tab$P_L_given_NoSeatYes <- round(post_S, 4)
tab
```

## (iv) Conclusion

- Distraction (Yes): most likely Location 1 (0.3093).
- No Seat (Yes): most likely Location 4 (0.5714).
